# 📺 `tvmux`

`asciinema` `tmux` recorder.

Python rewrite!

## 🎥 Why?!

So I can record `tmux` sessions and archive my workflow, then later use them for
AI training.

## ✋ How?

```python
$ uvx tvmux --help
```
